short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks if a link opens in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Tab Checker is a powerful Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience by providing valuable information about the behavior of website links. With Link Tab Checker, you can easily identify whether a link will open in a new tab or not, helping you navigate the web more efficiently.

Features:

Link Behavior Analysis: Determine if a link will open in a new tab or the same tab before clicking on it.
Instant Feedback: Receive immediate visual indicators to differentiate between links that open in new tabs and those that don't.
Improved Browsing Efficiency: Save time by knowing in advance how a link will behave and decide if you want to open it in a new tab.

Why Install Link Tab Checker:

Streamlined Browsing: No more surprises when clicking on links. Link Tab Checker empowers you with crucial information to make informed decisions and optimize your browsing flow.

Time-Saving: Avoid unnecessary tab switching or losing your current page context by quickly identifying links that open in new tabs.

Enhanced User Experience: Gain a better understanding of website navigation and easily manage your browsing sessions.



Note: Link Tab Checker operates seamlessly in the background, and it does not interfere with your browsing activities. Install now and unlock a smarter and more efficient way to browse the web!

Link Tab Checker is 100% open source:
https://github.com/Adam-Dalloul/link_tab_checker/tree/main
